1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Aljocab' vach' lolonel d'a Jehová, aton tz'ac'an vip. Aton val tzin c'ayb'ani, syac'anpax in jelanil yic vach' svac' oval.</t>
2: <t>Aton icha in n̈aq'ueen, icha val in cuartel, in Columal paxi. A' tzin c'ub'aneli. A' ayoch ven̈uloc. A' tz'ac'anoch eb' chon̈ab' d'a yalan̈ in mandar.</t>
3: <t>Mamin Jehová ¿tas val jab'oc quelc'och a on̈ anima on̈ tic d'a yol a sat, yuj chi' tzon̈ a nacoti? ¿Tas val quelc'ochi yuj chi' tzon̈ a ya'ilej?</t>
4: <t>A on̈ anima on̈ tic, lajan on̈ icha val b'aj squic' quic', axo co q'uinal icha val junoc en̈ul tz'eq'ui.</t>
5: <t>Mamin, jac spuertail satchaan̈ yic tzach emuli. Tzach emul d'a jolomtac vitz yic sq'ue stab'il lum uuj.</t>
6: <t>Julemta junoc a jul-lab', aton jun c'ac' tz'ec' copnajoc, tza pechanb'at eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayach d'a scal somc'olal.</t>
7: <t>Masanto d'a satchaan̈ chi' tzaq'uemta a c'ab' tzin a colanel d'a jun a' mar te nivan, syalelc'ochi, aton eb' ch'oc chon̈ab'il.</t>
8: <t>Colinel d'a eb' esalvum chi', aton eb' syic'chaan̈ sc'ab' syac'an sti' d'a tastac man̈ yeloc.</t>
9: <t>Ach in Diosal, ol in b'itej jun ac' b'it d'ayach. Ol in b'itan yed' sb'ital salterio d'ayach.</t>
10: <t>Uuj val, syal yuj eb' rey, a ach ton ix in a col d'a q'uen espada tzon̈ milanchamoc, a in David a checab' in tic.</t>
11: <t>A ticnaic, colinel d'a yol sc'ab' eb' ch'oc chon̈ab'il, eb' esalvum syac' sti' d'a tastac man̈ yeloc syala'.</t>
12: <t>Q'uib'ocab' eb' cuninal icha val tas tz'avchaj to ya ilab'il. A eb' ix quisil lajanocab' eb' ix icha junoc yoyal templo tzeyb'il, te vach' yilji.</t>
13: <t>A co pat, b'ud'jinacocab'el yuj junjun macan̈ vael. A noc' co calnel, q'uib'ocab' sb'isul noc' d'a smilal. Man̈xo b'ischajb'enocab' tz'aj sb'isul noc' co vacax.</t>
14: <t>Uneviocab' noc', mocab' ton̈ejoc tz'ec' sti' noc'. Malajocab' mach tz'el yav d'a yol scalleal co chon̈ab' yuj yaelal.</t>
15: <t>Yelxo val te vach' yic junoc chon̈ab' to icha chi' yaji. Yelxo val te vach' yic junoc chon̈ab' to a Jehová ayoch sDiosaloc.</t>
